languages.text: "Мне бы так пожить — хоть день. Я б такой пир устроил. И развлекали бы меня десять таких, как Мейв... без обид. Впрочем, наше дело — развлекать дворянство. Думаю, наши начнут так же себя вести, как Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа}..."

traits.locale_text: "Мне бы так пожить — хоть день. Я б такой пир устроил. И развлекали бы меня десять таких, как Мейв... без обид, мамзель".

languages.text: "If only I could live like that for just one day. I'd throw a great big feast. And I'd have dozens of entertainers, not just Maive here... no offence. But in the end, all we can do is please the nobles. I bet ours are going to start acting like the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}..."
languages.original_text: "Мне бы так пожить — хоть день. Я б такой пир устроил. И развлекали бы меня десять таких, как Мейв... без обид. Впрочем, наше дело — развлекать дворянство. Думаю, наши начнут так же себя вести, как Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа}..."

traits.locale_text: "If only I could live like that for just a day. I'd throw a great big feast. And I'd have dozens of entertainers like Maive here... no offence. But in the end, it's our job to entertain the nobles. I think ours are going to start acting like the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}..."

"If only I could live like that for just a day. I'd throw a great big feast. And I'd have dozens of entertainers like Maive here... no offence. But in the end, it's our job to entertain the nobles. I think ours are going to start acting like the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}..."

"If only I could live like that for just one day. I'd throw a great big feast. And I'd have dozens of entertainers, not just Maive here... no offence. But in the end, all we can do is please the nobles. I bet ours are going to start acting like the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}..."

"If only I could live like that for just one day. I'd throw a great big feast. And I'd have dozens of entertainers, not just Maive here... no offence. But in the end, all we can do is please the nobles. I bet ours are going to start acting like the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}..."

languages.text: “要是我也能过上那样的生活就好了。到时候，我要举办一场盛大的宴会，找几十个艺人给我表演，不像现在，只有梅芙一个……无意冒犯。但话说回来，我们能做的，也只有取悦那些贵族。我猜，我们那些贵族也要开始学习那位大人的作风了……”
languages.original_text: "If only I could live like that for just one day. I'd throw a great big feast. And I'd have dozens of entertainers, not just Maive here... no offence. But in the end, all we can do is please the nobles. I bet ours are going to start acting like the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}..."

traits.locale_text: “要是我也能过上那样的生活就好了。到时候，我要举办一场盛大的宴会，找几十个艺人给我表演，不像现在，只有梅芙一个……无意冒犯。但话说回来，我们能做的，也只有取悦那些贵族。我猜，我们那些贵族也要开始学习那位大人的作风了……”

languages.text: «Si tan solo pudiera vivir así un día, celebraría un gran banquete. Con montones de entretenimiento, no solo Maive... sin ánimo de ofender. Pero al final solo podemos agradar a los nobles. Seguro que los nuestros empiezan a imitar a{rt_mf|l Señor Celestial| la Señora Celestial}...».
languages.original_text: "If only I could live like that for just one day. I'd throw a great big feast. And I'd have dozens of entertainers, not just Maive here... no offence. But in the end, all we can do is please the nobles. I bet ours are going to start acting like the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}..."

traits.locale_text: «Si tan solo pudiera vivir así un día, celebraría un gran banquete. Con montones de entretenimiento, no solo Maive... sin ánimo de ofender. Pero al final solo podemos agradar a los nobles. Seguro que los nuestros empiezan a imitar a{rt_mf|l Señor Celestial| la Señora Celestial}...».

languages.text: "Keşke sadece bir günlüğüne böyle yaşayabilseydim. Koca bir ziyafet verirdim. Sadece şu Maive değil, onlarca eğlenceliğim olurdu... En nihayetinde tek yapabildiğimiz, soyluları memnun etmek. Bahse girerim bizimkiler, Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} gibi davranmaya başlayacaktır..."
languages.original_text: "If only I could live like that for just one day. I'd throw a great big feast. And I'd have dozens of entertainers, not just Maive here... no offence. But in the end, all we can do is please the nobles. I bet ours are going to start acting like the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}..."

traits.locale_text: "Keşke sadece bir günlüğüne böyle yaşayabilseydim. Koca bir ziyafet verirdim. Sadece şu Maive değil, onlarca eğlenceliğim olurdu... En nihayetinde tek yapabildiğimiz, soyluları memnun etmek. Bahse girerim bizimkiler, Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} gibi davranmaya başlayacaktır..."

languages.text: 「一日だけでもそんな風に生きられたら、俺はご馳走を放り出すだろう。そして、メイヴだけじゃなく…悪気はない…たくさんの芸人やらを呼ぶだろう。でも、結局のところ、俺たちにできることは貴族を楽しませることだけだ。俺たちの主人もきっと天の{rt_mf|君|姫}のように振る舞い始めるだろう…」
languages.original_text: "If only I could live like that for just one day. I'd throw a great big feast. And I'd have dozens of entertainers, not just Maive here... no offence. But in the end, all we can do is please the nobles. I bet ours are going to start acting like the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}..."

traits.locale_text: 「一日だけでもそんな風に生きられたら、俺はご馳走を放り出すだろう。そして、メイヴだけじゃなく…悪気はない…たくさんの芸人やらを呼ぶだろう。でも、結局のところ、俺たちにできることは貴族を楽しませることだけだ。俺たちの主人もきっと天の{rt_mf|君|姫}のように振る舞い始めるだろう…」

languages.text: « Si je pouvais vivre comme ça rien qu'une journée... J'organiserais un gigantesque festin. Et je ferais venir des dizaines de chanteurs et de danseurs, pas seulement Maive... sans vouloir t'offenser. Mais au final, on est bons qu'à servir les nobles. Je parie que les nôtres vont se mettre à imiter {rt_mf|le Seigneur|la Seigneure} Céleste... »
languages.original_text: "If only I could live like that for just one day. I'd throw a great big feast. And I'd have dozens of entertainers, not just Maive here... no offence. But in the end, all we can do is please the nobles. I bet ours are going to start acting like the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}..."

traits.locale_text: « Si je pouvais vivre comme ça rien qu'une journée... J'organiserais un gigantesque festin. Et je ferais venir des dizaines de chanteurs et de danseurs, pas seulement Maive... sans vouloir t'offenser. Mais au final, on est bons qu'à servir les nobles. Je parie que les nôtres vont se mettre à imiter {rt_mf|le Seigneur|la Seigneure} Céleste... »

languages.text: "Wenn ich doch nur einen einzigen Tag lang so leben könnte. Ich würde ein gewaltiges Fest geben. Und ich hätte dutzende von Unterhaltungskünstlern, nicht nur Maive ... ohne das böse zu meinen. Aber letztlich bleibt uns allen nichts anderes übrig, als den Adeligen zu dienen. Bestimmt fangen unsere auch bald an, sich wie {rt_mf|der himmlische Herr|die himmlische Herrin} zu benehmen ..."
languages.original_text: "If only I could live like that for just one day. I'd throw a great big feast. And I'd have dozens of entertainers, not just Maive here... no offence. But in the end, all we can do is please the nobles. I bet ours are going to start acting like the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}..."
